intro_paragraph1: Experienced developer specializing in website and application development. Providing high-quality and efficient solutions, I ensure a secure and fast launch for all projects.
intro_paragraph2: With over 6 years of experience and more than 50 successfully completed projects in various fields, I provide exceptional website development services. Let's collaborate to create innovative and impactful web solutions tailored to your needs.
plans: This is the Plans & Pricing page content. Add details about your pricing plans here.
howCanWeHelp: How can we help your business succeed with Web Development Services?
basicPlanDescription: Essential features for small businesses and personal projects.
proPlanDescription: Advanced features for growing businesses with increased demands.
enterprisePlanDescription: Customized solutions for large enterprises. Get in touch for a quote.

services_description.websites: Making websites of any type and industry, from information sites to online stores.
services_description.performance_guarantee: 100% guarantee of performance and follow-up service, ensuring the high quality and safety of my products.
services_description.technical_support: 24/7 technical support and free consultation to solve any problem quickly.

value_proposition: By choosing me, you choose reliability for sustainable and long-term solutions. Speed: Projects delivered on time and efficiently.
call_to_action: Join me and let's create something unique together, making your business accessible to a wide audience!
collaboration_message: Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life.
